name: RGBunny Squad
description:
A top-down shooter where you can switch your colour to avoid enemy attacks, but that also prevents you from attacking the enemies.

Use the arrow keys to move, Z to shoot, Esc/Q to pause and unpause, and A|S|D to switch between different colours (red, green and blue).

There's no audio yet.

Art by Sleepy Fox.

Font: Jellee (OFL)
